body_html: thanks for the reply @achowdhery. I'm leaving preallocation in the static create method as is. My only concern was that the code seems to be written to use preallocation (the static method preallocates the arrays), but for some reason the arrays are reallocated on each call.
body_text: thanks for the reply @achowdhery. I'm leaving preallocation in the static create method as is. My only concern was that the code seems to be written to use preallocation (the static method preallocates the arrays), but for some reason the arrays are reallocated on each call.
body: thanks for the reply @achowdhery. I'm leaving preallocation in the static `create` method as is. My only concern was that the code seems to be written to use preallocation (the static method preallocates the arrays), but for some reason the arrays are reallocated on each call.
